component.name: part0
component.description: Virtex-UltraScale+ FPGA part on the board

interface.name: ddr4_sdram_c1
interface.description: DDR4 board interface, it can use DDR4 IP for connection.

interface.name: ddr4_sdram_c2
interface.description: DDR4 board interface C2, it can use DDR4 IP for connection.

interface.name: sgmii_lvds
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in SGMII mode.

interface.name: mdio_mdc
interface.description: Secondary interface to communicate with ethernet phy when mode is selected as SGMII.

component.name: qsfp1
component.description: QSFP Connector 1

component.name: qsfp2
component.description: QSFP Connector 2

component.name: ddr4_sdram_c1
component.description: 4Gb DDR4 SDRAM memory C1

component.name: ddr4_sdram_c2
component.description: 4Gb DDR4 SDRAM memory C2

component.name: dip_switches_4bits
component.description: Dip Switches 3 to 0

component.name: default_sysclk1_300
component.description: 1.8V LVDS differential 300 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: pcie_refclk
component.description: Clock input from PCI Express edge connector

component.name: default_250mhz_clk1
component.description: 1.8V LVDS differential 250 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: default_250mhz_clk2
component.description: 1.8V LVDS differential 250 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: user_si570_clock
component.description: 3.3V LVDS SI570 programmable oscillator used as differential clock on the board; Can be programmed using system controller or using IIC interface in Virtex fabric

component.name: sysclk_125
component.description: 1.8V LVDS differential 125 MHz oscillator used as differential clock on the board

component.name: led_8bits
component.description: LEDs, 7 to 0, Active High

component.name: rs232_uart
component.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows serial communication to host computer with a USB port

component.name: iic_main
component.description: I2C

component.name: reset
component.description: CPU Reset Push Button, Active High

component.name: push_buttons_5bits
component.description: Push Buttons, C W E S N, Active High

component.name: pci_express
component.description: PCI Express

component.name: phy_reset_out
component.description: PHY RESET OUT

component.name: phy_onboard
component.description: PHY on the board

component.name: sgmii_phyclk
component.display_name: 625 MHz SGMII differential clock from Ethernt PHY
component.description: 625 MHz SGMII differential clock from Marvell PHY used as clock for SGMII interface
